issue.title: [C++] CSV reader doesn't remove BOM
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a CSV file starts with a byte-order mark, CSV reader doesn't strip it but instead adds it to the first column name.
